name: Bruschetta 1 - 2 - 3
description: An easy and elegant appetizer - perfect for any occasion.

ingredients.name: Pesto Sauce Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or salt

preparation: Preheat oven to broil. Lay bread slices on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and, using a basting brush, lightly brush with oil. Broil for 2 minutes each side, or until golden.
Top toasted bread slices with a heaping tablespoon of Bruschetta mixture.

products.name: Bruschetta Seasoning
summary: An aromatic blend of basil, garlic and parsley.
